rules:
(

(comments is null  and {'comment' 'replyComment'} contains post_type)
or (comments is not null and comments < 20)

) 

AND ((author__subscribers is null and  {'comment' 'replyComment'} contains post_type) or  author__subscribers is not null and author__subscribers < 2000)

AND (not {'pikabu.ru' 'flamp.ru' 'tjournal.ru' 'vc.ru' 'otzovik.com' null} contains source_name)

AND

not (source_name = 'facebook.com' and (text contains 'яндекс ' or text contains 'yandex' or text contains 'я такси' or text contains 'uber' or text contains 'убер')  and  {'comment' 'replyComment'} contains post_type)
